attributes.action: Promise to Uphold Freedom of Information as regards public scrutiny of MPs expenses
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Reportedly MPs are seeking to keep their expenses secret and overturn the means whereby the public can check up on how much expenses MPs claim. This is public money and MPs should remain accountable to the public for it. using their power to make it a secret is abuse of power.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
